name: Asteroids! Pygame Edition
description:
Asteroids recreated for the Pygame New Years 2021 game jam.

This game is still in early development, but i just wanted to show off a demo version before updating it too much (and also i kinda ran out of time, procrastination hit hard xd)

A lot of coding was done under the hood, so i'm not surprised there's no music and the aesthetics are garbage.
